code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";const useFetch=url=>{const[datas,setDatas]=useState(null);const[isPending,setIsPending]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch(url).then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw Error("Could not fetch data from that resource");return res.json();}).then(data=>{setDatas(data);setIsPending(false);setError(null);}).catch(err=>{console.log(datas);setError(err.message);setIsPending(false);});},[url]);return{datas,setDatas,isPending,error};};export default useFetch;
